coded_answer.p: I'm writing to complain about the performance, of Over The Rainbow at The Circle Theatre on the 14th of June. It is always a great opportunity to enjoy a musical when you go on your holiday to London. London is one of Europe's biggest centrecentres and you can always getfind the best in show business there. RescentlyRecently I decided to watchsee Over The Rainbow, a very famous and wellknownwell-known show.
Firstly, the nightevening performance was 45 minutes late and there were no discounts available as the advertisement toldpromisedhad promised.
Furthermore, I was shookedshocked when one of the main personsactors enteredcame onto the stage. He wasn't Danny Brook, one of the resonsreasons for my choice of coming to see Over the Rainbow.
Finally, the Theatre Restaurant was underbeing reparationrefurbished so we had to find another one for theour evening suppermeal.
This wasn't "my perfect evening out", as saidpromised, and I'll make a claim for half the money back. I'm looking forward to receiving youyour reply as soon as possiblypossible.

How has modern technology changed my daily life.? A century ago, when a farmer took the horses out of the stable and put the plougeplough behind them, we've got the word "time". Why not talk about the social life just sitting around a table without nowith no rush.

In modern daysToday we have to wearcarry a mobile phone. I visited an airport some days ago and in nearly every crowded corner, I could see those busy people who are always on their way somewhere. I heard the different phone signalsringing tones, and, what a miracle, you can change them on the train when you are restless. A new word has appearedA new world has opened up in those daysour times,; a technicaltangible proof of this is the computer. I can send and save information and the possibilities are uncountlessinfinite. In nearly every home you can find itone and the users now and in the future are the new generation.

I must say a few words about the new electrical cars which surely will have a central role to play, exspeciallyespecially today when fuel is so expensive. Watch outhow highly advancedhighly-advanced technologiestechnology arecan be appropriate and helpful for me and others, if we only remember the importance of taking time to be together.
